title: wChat
description: Chat application which organizes chatrooms in easy-to-use channels. Uses an invite system to faciliate access and preserve optional privacy. Completed from start to finish in less than one week.

title: Quick Grades
description: Grades storage and calculator app. Offers full CRUD functionality and displays statistics by course name.

title: httpserver
description: A multithreaded HTTP server implemented from scratch using UNIX sys/socket API for C. Serves static or dynamic HTML through the M4 text preprocessor.
